TextView.android:text: SYMPTOMS • high fever • diarrhea • voiting • headach • stomech pain • cough • weekness • loss of appetite • weight loss FOOD TO AVOID • high fibre food • oily food • spices (chilli, pepper, cayenne, vinegar) • raw vigitable FOOD TO EAT • high calorie food( like potatos, bananas, pasta, white bread) • fluid and fruits with high water content • food rich in carbohydrates( semi solid like poached eggs, baked potatos) • dairy products Causes • contaminited water • food washed with contaminited water
